title: Communities Act 1972, for the purpose of giving further effect to Regulation
heading: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the European Union (Food and Feed
text_raw:

Hygiene) (Amendment) Regulations 2020.

“(4) An application for registration in respect of a food business 
to which these Regulations applies that is- 

(a) not otherwise specified in this Regulation, or 

(b) 

specified in this Regulation, where- 

(i) 

(ii) 

the official agency specified as the registering 
authority no longer wishes to continue a service 
contract, or 

the official agency specified as a registering 
authority, in the opinion of the Food Safety 
Authority of Ireland, fails to discharge all or 
part of its obligations set out in the service 
contract 

shall be made to the registering authority to which the Food 
Safety Authority of Ireland directs the application, and be in a 
form and contain any information that the registering authority to 
which the application is directed to may require. 

(4A) For the avoidance of doubt, the registering authority to 
which an application may be directed to under paragraph (4) 
includes the Food Safety Authority of Ireland.”, and

title: Communities Act 1972, for the purpose of giving further effect to Regulation
heading: 10. (1) Except as provided in paragraph (2), a person shall, in
text_raw:
10. (1) Except as provided in paragraph (2), a person shall, in 
accordance with Article 56(3)(a) of Regulation No 2017/625, no 
later than 1 working day before the expected arrival, notify the 
Minister in writing, by means of Part I of the common health entry 
document, of his or her intention to move into the State food or 
feed to which these Regulations apply and that are referred to in 
Article 47(1) of Regulation No 2017/625. 

(2) A person referred to in paragraph (1) may, where logistical 
constraints prevent compliance with the time limit set out in 
paragraph (1), avail of the derogation provided for in Article 1(2) 
of Commission Implementing Regulation (EU) 2019/1013 of 16 
April 2019, but in such a case the period of prior notification shall 
be at least 24 hours. 

(3) Without prejudice to the generality of paragraph (1), where 
the consignment to be moved into the state contains animal feed, 
the person referred to in paragraph (1) shall provide the Minister 
with notice of the nature and quantity of animal feed including its 
GM and Organic Status.”, and 

(e) 

in Regulation 32(1), by substituting for subparagraph (j) the 
following: 

“(j) except as provided for in Regulation 10, being an operator, 
fails to provide prior notification in contravention of Article 
56(4),”. 

 
 
 
 
 [660] 7 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

17 December, 2020. 

CHARLIE MCCONALOGUE, 

Minister for Agriculture, Food and the Marine. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 8 [660]

title: Communities Act 1972, for the purpose of giving further effect to Regulation
heading: (This note is not part of the instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE. 

(This note is not part of the instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

These Regulations update the definitions of the Official Controls Regulation 
providing an alternative for competent authority and it also amends the 
notification period for imports of food and feed. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 [660] 9
